info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 3:57PM EST until January 09 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Moore County in central North Carolina... Central Scotland County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Anson County in central North Carolina... Richmond County in central North Carolina... * Until 445 PM EST. * At 357 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wadesboro to 6 miles west of Clyde, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockingham, Wadesboro, Pinehurst, Hamlet, Hoffman, Pinebluff, Ellerbe, Foxfire, Dobbins Heights, and Taylortown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central North Carolina. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central North Carolina.
